properties.areaDesc: Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 5 at 5:01AM CST until February 6 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with higher gusts. Seas 5 to
8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Gulf waters from High Island to the Matagorda Ship
Channel and out to 60 nautical miles.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 4 AM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM CST THURSDAY
